Name: Block Quic
Description: Block all use of Google's Quic protocol, enabling the use of SSL decrypt

Name: Network Services
Description: Permit network diagnostic applications to troubleshoot

Name: Ansible EDA permit
Description: Allow port 5000 destined to Ansible EDA servers

Description: Allow internet access to corporate LAN
